title: Create Media Buy Response
description: Response payload for create_media_buy task. Returns either complete success data OR error information, never both. This enforces atomic operation semantics - the media buy is either fully created or not created at all.

oneOf.title: CreateMediaBuySuccess
oneOf.description: Success response - media buy created successfully

media_buy_id.description: Publisher's unique identifier for the created media buy

buyer_ref.description: Buyer's reference identifier for this media buy

buyer_campaign_ref.description: Buyer's campaign reference label, echoed from the request

account.description: Account billed for this media buy. Includes advertiser, billing proxy (if any), and rate card applied.

creative_deadline.description: ISO 8601 timestamp for creative upload deadline

packages.description: Array of created packages with complete state information

sandbox.description: When true, this response contains simulated data from sandbox mode.

oneOf.title: CreateMediaBuyError
oneOf.description: Error response - operation failed, no media buy created

errors.description: Array of errors explaining why the operation failed
